languages.text: "Маршал может увидеть в таком решении знак, что союз между вашей династией и Арбитес будет разорван. Что я должен передать ему?"
"The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"
languages.original_text: "Маршал может увидеть в таком решении знак, что союз между вашей династией и Арбитес будет разорван. Что я должен передать ему?"

traits.locale_text: "The Marshal might see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"
"The Marshal might see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"
"The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"
"The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"
"The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"
"The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"

languages.text: 「将帥は、これをあなたの王朝と高等裁定局との同盟が破綻する兆しと受け取るかもしれません。どう伝えればいいでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"

traits.locale_text: 「将帥は、これをあなたの王朝と高等裁定局との同盟が破綻する兆しと受け取るかもしれません。どう伝えればいいでしょうか？」

languages.text: "Der Marschall könnte das als Zeichen interpretieren, dass die Allianz zwischen Eurer Dynastie und dem Adeptus Arbites zerbrochen ist. Was soll ich ihm sagen?"
languages.original_text: "The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Marschall könnte das als Zeichen interpretieren, dass die Allianz zwischen Eurer Dynastie und dem Adeptus Arbites zerbrochen ist. Was soll ich ihm sagen?"

languages.text: « Le maréchal pourrait interpréter mon renvoi comme un souhait de votre part de mettre fin à l'alliance entre votre dynastie et l'Adeptus Arbites. Souhaitez-vous que je lui transmette un message ? »
languages.original_text: "The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"

traits.locale_text: « Le maréchal pourrait interpréter mon renvoi comme un souhait de votre part de mettre fin à l'alliance entre votre dynastie et l'Adeptus Arbites. Souhaitez-vous que je lui transmette un message ? »

languages.text: «El mariscal podría interpretarlo como una señal de que se ha roto la alianza entre su dinastía y el Adeptus Arbites. ¿Qué debo decirle?».
languages.original_text: "The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"

traits.locale_text: «El mariscal podría interpretarlo como una señal de que se ha roto la alianza entre su dinastía y el Adeptus Arbites. ¿Qué debo decirle?».

languages.text: “元帅可能会认为，你的王朝与法务部之间的联盟就此破裂。我该怎么和他解释呢？”
languages.original_text: "The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"

traits.locale_text: “元帅可能会认为，你的王朝与法务部之间的联盟就此破裂。我该怎么和他解释呢？”

languages.text: "Miralay, bunu hanedanlığınızla Adeptus Arbites arasındaki ittifakın bozulduğuna yönelik işaret olarak yorumlayabilir. Kendisine nasıl bir aktarımda bulunayım?"
languages.original_text: "The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"

traits.locale_text: "Miralay, bunu hanedanlığınızla Adeptus Arbites arasındaki ittifakın bozulduğuna yönelik işaret olarak yorumlayabilir. Kendisine nasıl bir aktarımda bulunayım?"

languages.original_text: "The Marshal may see this as a sign that the alliance between your dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites is broken. What should I tell him?"
